title: EchoStar Announces Spectrum Sale and Commercial Agreement with SpaceX
content: EchoStar to sell full portfolio of AWS-4 and H-block spectrum licenses to SpaceX. With AWS-4 and H-block spectrum licenses, SpaceX to develop and deploy a next-generation Starlink Direct-To-Cell constellation. ENGLEWOOD, Colo. and HAWTHORNE, Calif. , Sept. 8, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- EchoStar has entered into a definitive agreement with SpaceX to sell the company's AWS-4 and H-block spectrum licenses for approximately $17 billion , consisting of up to $8.5 billion in cash and up to $8.5 billion in SpaceX stock valued as of the entry into the definitive agreement. Additionally, the definitive agreement provides for SpaceX to fund an aggregate of approximately $2 billion of cash interest payments payable on EchoStar debt through November of 2027. In connection with the transaction, SpaceX and EchoStar will enter into a long-term commercial agreement, which will enable EchoStar's Boost Mobile subscribers – through its cloud-native 5G core – to access SpaceX's next generation Starlink Direct to Cell service. "For the past decade, we've acquired spectrum and facilitated worldwide 5G spectrum standards and devices, all with the foresight that direct-to-cell connectivity via satellite would change the way the world communicates," said Hamid Akhavan , president & CEO, EchoStar. "This transaction with SpaceX continues our legacy of putting the customer first as it allows for the combination of AWS-4 and H-block spectrum from EchoStar with the rocket launch and satellite capabilities from SpaceX to realize the direct-to-cell vision in a more innovative, economical and faster way for consumers worldwide." "We're so pleased to be doing this transaction with EchoStar as it will advance our mission to end mobile dead zones around the world," said Gwynne Shotwell , president & COO, SpaceX. "SpaceX's first generation Starlink satellites with Direct to Cell capabilities have already connected millions of people when they needed it most – during natural disasters so they could contact emergency responders and loved ones – or when they would have previously been off the grid. In this next chapter, with exclusive spectrum, SpaceX will develop next generation Starlink Direct to Cell satellites, which will have a step change in performance and enable us to enhance coverage for customers wherever they are in the world." EchoStar anticipates this transaction with SpaceX along with the previously announced spectrum sale will resolve the Federal Communications Commission's (FCC) inquiries. Closing of the proposed transaction will occur after all required regulatory approvals are received and other closing conditions are satisfied. The proceeds of this transaction will be used for, among other things, retiring certain debt obligations and funding EchoStar's continued operations and growth initiatives. Current operations of EchoStar's DISH TV, Sling and Hughes will not be impacted by this transaction. EchoStar was represented by White & Case LLP and Steptoe LLP for this transaction. SpaceX was represented by Gibson Dunn & Crutcher LLP and HWG LLP. About EchoStar Corporation EchoStar Corporation (Nasdaq: SATS ) is a premier provider of technology, networking services, television entertainment and connectivity, offering consumer, enterprise, operator and government solutions worldwide under its EchoStar®, Boost Mobile®, Sling TV, DISH TV, Hughes®, HughesNet®, HughesON™, and JUPITER™ brands. In Europe , EchoStar operates under its EchoStar Mobile Limited subsidiary and in Australia , the company operates as EchoStar Global Australia. For more information, visit www.echostar.com and follow EchoStar on X (Twitter) and LinkedIn. ©2025 EchoStar, Hughes, HughesNet, DISH and Boost Mobile are registered trademarks of one or more affiliate companies of EchoStar Corp. About SpaceX SpaceX designs, manufactures, and launches the world's most advanced rockets and spacecraft. The company was founded in 2002 to revolutionize space technology, with the ultimate goal of making life multiplanetary. As the world's leading provider of launch services, SpaceX is leveraging its deep experience with both spacecraft and on-orbit operations to deploy the world's most advanced internet and Direct to Cell networks. Engineered to end mobile dead zones around the world, Starlink's satellites with Direct to Cell capabilities enable ubiquitous access to texting, calling, and browsing wherever you may be on land, lakes, or coastal waters. SOURCE EchoStar Corporation

title: Cerity Partners Announces Merger with Graypoint
content: The addition of Graypoint deepens Cerity Partners' offering for individuals, families, nonprofit organizations, and corporate executives in the New York Capital Region NEW YORK , Sept. 5, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Cerity Partners, a leading independent wealth management firm in the U.S., announced today its plans to merge with Graypoint, an Albany , NY–based financial advisory firm. The merger will meaningfully enhance Cerity Partners' presence in the Capital Region. Following the closing, Graypoint will operate under the Cerity Partners brand, and Daniel Nolan , President & CEO of Graypoint, will assume the role of Partner and Vice Chairman of Cerity Partners. Graypoint has developed a reputation for serving high-net-worth and ultra-high-net-worth individuals and institutions. Given Graypoint's deep expertise in advising and serving corporate executives, the merger will also bolster Cerity Partners' Workplace Solutions capabilities. Kurt Miscinski , President and CEO of Cerity Partners commented: "We're truly excited to welcome our new partners and colleagues from Graypoint to our firm. Their breadth and depth of expertise are a wonderful complement to our firm. We look forward to building a world class firm with them." "This partnership is an extension of the same core values upon which Graypoint was founded," said Daniel Nolan . "By joining forces with Cerity Partners, we are doubling down on our commitment to help clients preserve, steward and grow the wealth they've created—and to help them define where their wealth meets purpose." Graypoint also brings significant institutional advisory experience, currently working with more than 60 nonprofits in New York's Capital Region and beyond. Republic Capital Group is advising Graypoint in the combination, and Alston & Bird is serving as legal counsel. Lowenstein Sandler is serving as legal counsel for Cerity Partners. About Cerity Partners Founded in 2009, Cerity Partners is a nationally recognized full-service wealth management firm serving high-net-worth and ultra-high-net-worth individuals and their families, businesses and their leadership teams, and nonprofit organizations. Visit ceritypartners.com to learn more. About Graypoint Graypoint brings considerable experience providing financial advisory and investment services tailored to individuals, families, businesses, and nonprofit organizations. In aggregate, Graypoint manages over $4.5 billion on behalf of their clients. To learn more, go to https://graypointllc.com/ Media Contact Pro-ceritypartners@prosek.com SOURCE Cerity Partners

title: VSP Vision Enters into Definitive Agreement to Acquire Marcolin from PAI Partners and Other Minority Shareholders
content: RANCHO CORDOVA, Calif. and LONGARONE, Italy , Sept. 5, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- VSP Vision ™ announced today it has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire Marcolin from PAI Partners, a pre-eminent private equity firm, and other minority shareholders. The acquisition of Marcolin, a global leader in eyewear design, manufacturing, and distribution, will mark a significant eyewear investment by VSP Vision to provide even more value to its stakeholders. "The addition of Marcolin is another example of our commitment to purposeful growth that will provide greater value for VSP members, clients, doctors, and key customers," said Michael Guyette , President and CEO of VSP Vision. "With a portfolio of some of the world's most sought-after brands and advanced in-house manufacturing capabilities, Marcolin will strongly complement our existing offerings through Marchon Eyewear as we continue to deliver high-quality eyewear that meets diverse and evolving global customer needs." Founded in Northern Italy in 1961, Marcolin today distributes its eyewear collections in more than 125 countries. Its portfolio of luxury and lifestyle brands includes Tom Ford , Zegna, Christian Louboutin , ic! berlin, Max Mara , Guess, and many others. "With a shared passion for bringing the highest quality eyewear to as many people as possible, joining VSP Vision is a perfect fit," said Fabrizio Curci , CEO & General Manager of Marcolin. "We look forward to combining our expertise, focus on craftsmanship, commitment to product innovation and complementary portfolios and geographic presence to give customers the very best in eyewear and service." With the backing of PAI, Marcolin broadened its international reach and enhanced operational efficiency, establishing itself as a leading player in the wholesale eyewear market. Under PAI's ownership, Marcolin's performance has advanced significantly, supported by a strong focus on commercial excellence, a strategic corporate reorganization, and the expansion of its brand portfolio through targeted acquisitions, new licensing agreements and key renewals. "We are delighted to have backed Marcolin's transformation into a world leader in the wholesale eyewear business", said Raffaele Vitale , Partner at PAI. "We are grateful to the management team for their partnership and are confident that Marcolin is well positioned to continue thriving in the years ahead, with plenty of runway for growth and a portfolio of iconic brands." CapM Advisors acted as the exclusive financial advisor, and Latham & Watkins acted as the legal advisor to the shareholders of Marcolin. Kirkland & Ellis LLP and Chiomenti acted as legal advisors to VSP. The transaction is expected to close in the fourth quarter of 2025 and is subject to customary regulatory approvals. About VSP Vision At VSP Vision ™ , our purpose is to empower human potential through sight. As the first national not-for-profit vision benefits company, this is what drives everything we do. For 70 years, VSP ® has been a leader in health-focused vision care. Every day, the people that power our complementary businesses across vision benefits, eye care services, eyewear solutions, and practice solutions, work together to create a world where everyone can bring their best vision to life. That means providing affordable access to eye care and eyewear for more than 85 million members through a network of more than 42,000 doctors. It also means expanding access to vision care to those disadvantaged by income, distance, or disaster through VSP Vision Eyes of Hope ® . To date, more than 4.3 million people in need have received access to no-cost eye care and eyewear through one of our Eyes of Hope programs. Learn more about how we're reinvesting in greater vision, health, and opportunities for all at vspvision.com . About Marcolin Marcolin is among the global leading groups in eyewear founded in 1961 in the heart of the Veneto district, Italy . It stands out for the unique ability to combine craftsmanship with advanced technologies through the constant pursuit of excellence and continuous innovation. The portfolio includes house brands (WEB EYEWEAR, ic! berlin), as well as licensed brands: TOM FORD , Guess, adidas Sport, adidas Originals, Christian Louboutin , Max Mara , Zegna, GCDS, MAX&Co., MCM, Pucci, BMW, K-Way®, Kenneth Cole , Abercrombie & Fitch, Hollister , rag & bone, Timberland, GANT, Harley-Davidson, Marciano and Skechers. Through its own direct network and global partners, Marcolin distributes its products in more than 125 countries. About PAI Partners PAI Partners is a pre-eminent private equity firm investing in market-leading companies across the globe. The Firm has more than €27 billion of assets under management and, since 1994, has completed over 100 investments in 12 countries and realised more than €27 billion in proceeds from over 60 exits. PAI has built an outstanding track record through partnering with ambitious management teams where its unique perspective, unrivalled sector experience, and long-term vision enable companies to pursue their full potential – and push beyond. Learn more about the PAI story, the team and their approach at: www.paipartners.com Media Contact jace.duval@vsp.com 916.947.4663 SOURCE VSP Vision

title: Climb Credit Acquires Career Karma Platform to Expand Access to Career Training Through Mission-Aligned Enrollment Support
content: Strategic acquisition brings together two mission-driven platforms in the career training space to enhance the learner journey from program discovery to enrollment and beyond NEW YORK , Sept. 4, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Climb Credit , a leading student payment platform focused on career training, today announced its acquisition of Career Karma , a trusted platform helping millions of prospective students explore and navigate job training programs. Founded in 2018 by Ruben Harris , Timur Meyster , and Artur Meyster , Career Karma has guided over 100 million visitors toward upskilling resources and helped thousands land roles in technology. With this acquisition, Climb will carry forward Career Karma's mission while expanding its reach into new, high-demand industries. "For over a decade, Climb has worked to remove financial, informational, and motivational barriers to career education," said Casey Powers , CEO of Climb Credit . "This acquisition isn't just about scaling — it's about impact. We're building a platform that serves students across many different industries, from healthcare to the skilled trades, reflecting the diverse opportunities learners are pursuing today. Together, we're helping learners not only finance their education but confidently choose the right path for their future." A shared mission to support the learner journey Climb and Career Karma have both been built on a belief that access to career-aligned education can change lives. For many prospective students, the hardest part isn't just paying for school. It's knowing where to start, how to choose the right program, or how to get through the application process. Schools want to help, but often lack the bandwidth to guide every student through that discovery phase. By combining their strengths, Climb and Career Karma will offer: "When determining the best future for the Career Karma platform, we were excited by the alignment that Climb has with our core mission," said Ruben Harris , Founder of Career Karma. "We're looking forward to seeing how they expand what we built into the many career paths that they support with their other products." Experienced leadership to drive the next chapter To lead Career Karma's next chapter, Climb tapped Jeff Herbst , a seasoned marketing executive with a track record in student recruitment. Jeff has held leadership roles at Noodle and 2U and most recently founded Protostar Studio to help schools profitably grow student enrollments. He brings deep expertise in organic media, performance marketing, and enrollment management. "We have an opportunity to expand the impact of the Career Karma platform, with the student at the center," said Jeff Herbst . "We're focused on helping people find the right program and the support they need to get started. And we're doing it in a way that also makes it easier for schools to achieve their enrollment objectives." Strategic value for schools For career training providers, the new Career Karma platform will offer: TripleTen , an online coding bootcamp for career changers that offers flexible, beginner-friendly programs to help anyone become a job-ready tech professional, has partnered with Career Karma to pilot this new offering. "Finding the right training partner and getting ready for enrollment has always been a challenge for students looking to start their new careers. We are excited to partner with Career Karma and Climb Credit on this innovative approach that makes bootcamp education more accessible and effective," said TripleTen CDPO, Russell Ramesh . A Platform with Momentum and a Vision for the Future This acquisition builds on Climb's ongoing investment in creating an end-to-end support ecosystem for students and schools. While financing will remain separate from the Career Karma discovery experience, Climb's broader vision continues to be shaped by a deep understanding of the barriers students face—financial and otherwise—and how to remove them thoughtfully. About Climb Credit Climb (NMLS# 1240013) is a student payment platform that helps make career-focused education more accessible and affordable. The company partners with schools that teach everything from cybersecurity and data science to healthcare, skilled trades, and AI. Climb helps learners find the right program and offers payment options designed for those seeking practical, job-ready training. About Career Karma Career Karma is an education discovery platform that connects people with career training programs in technology—expanding soon to healthcare and the skilled trades. The platform helps learners make confident decisions through personalized matching, direct support, and community. Media Contact Laura Mauro laura.mauro@climbcredit.com SOURCE Climb Credit

title: Bishop Lifting Acquires American Rigger's Supply, Expanding Footprint into Kansas City and the Midwest
content: HOUSTON , Sept. 4, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Bishop Lifting (Bishop), a portfolio company of Altamont Capital Partners, today announced the completed acquisition of American Rigger's Supply, Inc. (American Rigger's), a leading sling fabrication and rigging supply company headquartered in Kansas City, Kansas . Founded more than 50 years ago by Chris Hughes , American Rigger's has been family-owned and operated since its inception. Today, it is owned by Chris's daughter, Jennifer Hughes , and serves a wide range of industries through its fabrication capabilities and service offerings. American Rigger's designs and manufactures custom lifting solutions made from wire rope, chain, webbing, wire mesh, and continuous fiber. In addition, the company provides training in rigging and fall protection, equipment inspections, proof testing, and repair of lifting devices. This acquisition marks Bishop's 15th acquisition since 2012 and the eighth add-on since Altamont's investment. The Kansas City location adds a strategically important branch to Bishop's network, strengthening its presence in the Midwest and enhancing its ability to serve customers locally with a broad suite of lifting products and services. Following the transaction, Jennifer Hughes and founding employee Jim Leach will assist with the transition. Neal Edwards will serve as Branch Manager, leading day-to-day operations. "Bishop Lifting is the right fit for our employees and our customers," said Jennifer Hughes , owner of American Rigger's Supply. "I am proud to see the company my father started more than 50 years ago join a team that will continue his legacy, invest in our people, and provide expanded opportunities for growth." "The acquisition of American Rigger's strengthens Bishop's footprint with an important branch in Kansas City and broader access to the Midwest," said Chase Beeler , Managing Director at Altamont Capital Partners. "American Rigger's has delivered impressive growth in recent years, and we look forward to building on that momentum with Bishop's broader products, services, and resources. We are proud to welcome their team to the Bishop family." About Bishop Lifting Founded in 1984, Bishop Lifting is the largest provider of wire rope, slings, rigging, fall protection, and related safety-critical products in North America . Bishop's dedicated employees help leading companies across all industries solve their lifting and industrial needs. With over 45 branches located strategically across the United States and Canada , customers have the advantage of accessing Bishop's large breadth of products from any location. About Altamont Capital Partners Founded in 2010, Altamont Capital Partners (" Altamont ") is a private equity firm focused on transforming and scaling lower-middle market companies through significant business-building and value-creation resources. Altamont makes long-term, control investments in sectors where we have deep experience and specialized knowledge, and partners with management teams to execute proven and repeatable platform-building playbooks. Since inception, Altamont has invested in over 45 companies operating across the Industrials, Business Services, Financial Services, and Franchising & Multi-Unit sectors. Altamont currently manages over $4.5 billion of capital and is headquartered in Palo Alto, California , with additional offices in San Francisco and Austin, Texas . For more information, visit www.altamontcapital.com . Media Contact: David Moseley "Mo" VP Marketing Bishop Lifting Products, Inc. 2301 Commerce St., Ste. 110 Houston, TX 77002 (713) 512-1700 O (713) 671-7803 D (713) 702-4563 C david.moseley@lifting.com www.Lifting.com SOURCE Bishop Lifting

title: Summit 7 Acquires GRC Academy, Expanding CMMC Education for the Defense Industrial Base
content: HUNTSVILLE, Ala. , Sept. 4, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Summit 7 is pleased to announce the acquisition of GRC Academy, an industry-leading training platform founded by cybersecurity professional Jacob Hill . The move expands Summit 7's education and enablement portfolio for Defense Industrial Base (DIB) organizations navigating CMMC and broader federal compliance requirements. Since its founding, GRC Academy has delivered practical, high-impact training to DIB professionals preparing for CMMC certification. The platform is known for its clear instruction, actionable guidance, and real-world examples tailored to small and mid-sized defense contractors. Summit 7 Expands Leadership in CMMC with GRC Academy Acquisition, Elevating Training and Education Scott Edwards , CEO of Summit 7 said, "GRC Academy is a huge asset to the ecosystem, and we're excited to expand it under the Summit 7 brand. This acquisition strengthens our collective ability to equip defense contractors not just with the right tools and managed services, but with the education they need to implement those tools effectively." Under the Summit 7 banner, GRC Academy's training content will continue to serve current students throughout their enrollment period. This acquisition marks a key step in Summit 7's ongoing investment in customer success, training, and industry thought leadership. As the CMMC ecosystem matures and requirements roll out contractually across the supply chain, organizations need understanding, clarity, and confidence more than ever. GRC Academy's integration into Summit 7 reflects a shared belief that education is foundational to security. The expanded content and delivery channels will make CMMC and NIST 800-171 education more accessible to a broader range of contractors, from small subcontractors to large primes. For more information, visit summit7.us. About Summit 7 Summit 7 is the trusted partner for DoD cybersecurity, compliance, and managed services, with the largest team of certified experts in the Defense Industrial Base (DIB). Specializing in NIST 800-171 and CMMC compliance, Summit 7 supports proactive, excellence-driven federal contractors in securing their systems and achieving regulatory readiness. SOURCE Summit 7 Systems

title: Milrose Consultants and Southfield Capital Announce the Strategic Acquisition of Borne Consulting
content: GREENWICH, Conn. , Sept. 4, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Southfield Capital, a premier lower middle market private equity firm, announced today that Milrose Consultants ("Milrose"), a leading national regulatory consulting and compliance firm serving the built environment, has completed the acquisition of Borne Consulting ("Borne"), a San Francisco -based architectural engineering firm specializing in building envelope solutions. The acquisition of Borne represents Milrose's fourteenth acquisition since partnering with Southfield and further expands Milrose's presence in Northern California . Borne has built a reputation for delivering high-quality technical expertise and pragmatic solutions for complex building rehabilitation projects. With a focus on façades, roofing, balconies, and below-grade waterproofing, Borne provides a full suite of services including condition assessments, construction documentation, permitting support, capital asset planning, bidding coordination, and construction administration. The acquisition of Borne extends Milrose's architectural and engineering presence in Northern California and adds specialized expertise in envelope consulting and restoration services. Borne's trusted local relationships and proven project delivery enhance Milrose's ability to support complex rehabilitation projects in the region. Cade D. Osborne, PE, Founder and Principal of Borne, expressed his enthusiasm, "I'm excited to join forces with Milrose Consultants. Milrose's national platform and commitment to excellence will allow us to scale our impact and continue providing thoughtful, high-performance solutions to building owners and managers across the country." "Cade's deep technical knowledge and client-first approach align perfectly with Milrose's mission to deliver best-in-class building lifecycle services," said Dominic Maurillo , CEO of Milrose Consultants. "This acquisition strengthens our capabilities in architectural engineering and expands our presence in the Bay Area, allowing us to better serve our clients with enhanced envelope consulting and restoration services." Southfield Partner, Chris Grambling , commented on the transaction, "The addition of Borne to the Milrose platform underscores our commitment to expanding both our national footprint and the depth of expertise we offer clients. We look forward to working with Cade to enhance Milrose's suite of services and presence in the Bay Area." About Milrose Consultants Milrose Consultants is the national leader in the field of building code consulting and municipal expediting with headquarters in New York City and offices nationwide. Customers rely on Milrose to provide end-to-end building compliance services that include permitting, code & zoning, regulatory filing, special inspections, façade inspections, due diligence & research, and other compliance solutions. Milrose provides high-end services across various large, growing industries, including commercial, multi-family residential, retail, industrial, healthcare, and academia. For more information, please visit www.milrose.com . About Southfield Capital Southfield Capital is a private equity firm that invests in high-growth, lower middle market companies in the business services sector. The firm targets companies with $4 - 20 million in EBITDA and partners with management to scale the business through a combination of organic and acquisition growth strategies. For more information, please visit www.southfieldcapital.com . SOURCE Southfield Capital

title: Aequum Capital Provides $30 Million Senior Secured Credit Facilities to West Virginia-Based Behavioral Health Provider
content: CHICAGO , Sept. 4, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Aequum Capital is pleased to announce the closing of a $30 million senior secured credit facility—consisting of a $25 million term loan and a $5 million revolving line of credit—to support the acquisition of a West Virginia -based provider of substance use disorder (SUD) and mental health treatment services. This transaction represents Aequum Capital's second deal with the same financial sponsor, underscoring a strong, long-term partnership and our ability to deliver certainty of execution on time-sensitive acquisitions. The bespoke facility provides the Company with a flexible capital structure to support integration, working capital needs, and future growth initiatives across its continuum of SUD and mental health services. "This financing underscores our ability to underwrite complex healthcare service models and craft structures that support both acquisition and ongoing growth," said John Stanfield , CEO of Aequum Capital. "We're proud to continue our relationship with this sponsor and to back a mission‑driven provider expanding access to high‑quality behavioral health care in West Virginia ." About Aequum Capital Aequum Capital Financial is a specialty finance lender providing senior asset-based and cash flow debt facilities of up to $35 million to small and medium-sized businesses across the United States . For more information, please go to https://aequumcapital.com or contact John Stanfield at johnstanfield@aequumcapital.com . SOURCE Aequum Capital Financial LLC

title: Embark Announces Strategic Investment from Parthenon Capital to Accelerate Growth
content: Parthenon partnership positions Embark for scale and continued market expansion DALLAS , Sept. 4, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Embark, a leading management and financial consulting firm, announces it has entered into a strategic partnership with Parthenon Capital, a premier growth-focused private equity firm. This investment marks a significant milestone for Embark, providing the resources and strategic support to accelerate its mission of delivering innovative solutions to executive leaders and their teams. Felice Gorordo , CEO of Embark, shared, "We are incredibly excited and proud to partner with Parthenon Capital. Parthenon's investment will enhance Embark's existing service offerings for our clients, accelerate our growth both organically and through acquisition, and further our commitment to our people. In Parthenon , we have found a partner that is strongly aligned with our shared values and vision for an unwavering focus on people, unmatched customer satisfaction, and delivering high-value, cutting-edge solutions." Parthenon Capital, with over $10 billion in capital commitments, is a leading private equity firm with a long track record of partnering with founders and management teams to build franchise companies in the financial services sector, with particular expertise in professional services and human capital-driven business models. The firm takes a research-driven approach to specific industry sectors and first identified Embark through a multi-year deep-dive focused on advisory services and technology shaping the future of the Office of the CFO. "We have followed Embark's impressive journey for years and are excited to partner with a true disruptor in the financial advisory and consulting industry," said Andrew Dodson , Managing Partner at Parthenon Capital. "Embark's client-centric culture and innovative approach set them apart, and we look forward to supporting their continued growth and expansion." Tom Hough , Principal with Parthenon Capital, continued, "Since we first had the chance to meet the Embark team, we have been continually impressed with their differentiated focus on their people and delivering world-class solutions to their clients. We are excited to continue their investments in technology, develop additional capabilities to serve their clients, and support their unique culture which truly sets the company apart." Parthenon's investment will enable Embark to expand its technology capabilities, with a particular focus on advancements in automation and artificial intelligence within the office of the CFO. The partnership will also support attracting and developing top talent, as well as pursuing new strategic opportunities. These efforts are designed to better serve clients across financial advisory, business transformation, deal advisory, outsourced accounting, and other key advisory service offerings. Ensuring continuity and alignment with Embark's people-centric values, Paul Allen , Embark Founder, will remain Chairman of the Board, retain a significant ownership stake, and lead the Board's People & Culture Committee. Paul shared, "We couldn't be more excited to be partnering with Parthenon Capital. As we grow, our focus on culture and people will only deepen with Parthenon's support." With an addressable market exceeding $80 billion and increasing demand for technology-enabled solutions, Embark's differentiated model and strong client satisfaction—combined with Parthenon's proven track record of driving meaningful impact and growth—position the company to capitalize on industry trends and support clients in a rapidly changing business environment. Guggenheim Securities, LLC acted as sole financial advisor and Perkins Coie LLP served as legal counsel to Embark. Kirkland & Ellis LLP served as legal counsel to Parthenon . About Embark Embark is a business consulting firm dedicated to transforming complex problems into clear solutions. Embark helps CFOs and business leaders navigate challenges and achieve their goals through financial advisory, business transformation, deal advisory, outsourcing, and tailored solutions. Operating in 26 strategic markets, Embark brings its expertise and personalized approach to clients across the country while fostering a culture where "happy works." Learn more at www.embarkwithus.com . About Parthenon Capital Parthenon Capital is a leading growth-oriented private equity firm with offices in Boston , San Francisco , and Austin . Parthenon utilizes niche industry expertise and a deep execution team to invest in growth companies in service and technology industries. Parthenon seeks to be an active and aligned partner to management, either through recapitalization transactions or by backing new executives. Parthenon has particular expertise in financial and insurance services, healthcare and technology services, but seeks any service, technology, or delivery business with a strong value proposition and proprietary know-how. For more information, visit www.parthenoncapital.com . SOURCE Embark

title: JustBrand Limited Acquires Venture Heat, Expanding Leadership in Heated Apparel Innovation
content: PHILADELPHIA , Sept. 4, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- JustBrand Limited, a leader in heated apparel and wearable technology, is proud to announce its acquisition of Venture Heat , one of the original pioneers in battery-heated gear. This strategic move strengthens JustBrand's position as the largest heated clothing company in North America , signaling the next chapter in its commitment to safety, performance, and innovation in the heated wearables market. With a proven portfolio that includes consumer-favorite brands such as The Warming Store , ActionHeat , Gerbing , AlphaCool, and Chaheati , JustBrand Limited continues to redefine comfort for outdoor enthusiasts, workers, and adventurers alike. The addition of Venture Heat , known for its cutting-edge technology and reputation, aligns perfectly with JustBrand's mission to deliver premium heated clothing across retail, tactical, and industrial sectors. "Venture Heat has been a respected innovator in this category for over two decades," said Justin Silverman , Co-CEO of JustBrand Limited . "Their team brings a wealth of product knowledge and technical expertise that will elevate our capabilities and help us move even faster to serve our customers and partners." "This acquisition is more than a brand addition—it's a cultural fit," said Brandon Singer , Co-CEO of JustBrand Limited . "We share the same commitment to quality, performance, and innovation. Adding Venture Heat unlocks exciting opportunities to expand our product line and expand into new markets." Venture Heat's product line includes heated jackets , gloves, motorcycle gear, and waterproof heated diving vests . The brand's strong foundation in technological innovation will bolster JustBrand's R&D capabilities, enabling faster product development across its whole portfolio. What This Means for Customers and Partners: About JustBrand Limited: Headquartered in Philadelphia , JustBrand Limited is the parent company behind a portfolio of category-defining heated and cooling brands, including ActionHeat , Gerbing , AlphaCool , and Chaheati . Known for its rapid innovation, deep retail relationships, and direct-to-consumer strength, JustBrand is on a mission to make heated clothing and cooling apparel safer, smarter, and more accessible for everyone. For more information, visit https://www.justbrandlimited.com or follow us on LinkedIn, Instagram, and Facebook. SOURCE JustBrand Limited

title: TBO ÜBERNIMMT CLASSIC VACATIONS VON DEN NAJAFI COMPANIES, UM SEINE GLOBALE REICHWEITE AUF NORDAMERIKA AUSZUWEITEN
content: Mit dem Kauf des führenden US-Großhändlers für Luxusreisen erweitert TBO seine Dienstleistungen für den Premium-Auslandsreisemarkt auf globaler Ebene SAN FRANCISCO , 3. September 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- TBO (NSE: TBO TEK) mit Sitz in Gurugram, Indien, gab seine Vereinbarung zum Erwerb des US-amerikanischen Unternehmens Classic Vacations von der in Phoenix ansässigen Investmentfirma The Najafi Companies für einen geschätzten Gesamtkaufpreis von bis zu 125 Mio. USD bekannt. Die Übernahme vereint die Stärke der erstklassigen Technologieplattform und des weltweiten Inventars von TBO mit dem umfangreichen Netzwerk von Luxusreiseberatern und -anbietern von Classic Vacation. Classic Vacations erzielte im Geschäftsjahr zum 31. Dezember 2024 einen Umsatz von 111 Mio. USD und ein operatives EBITDA von 11,2 Mio. USD. Die Expansion von TBO in den Premium-Auslandsreisemarkt passt strategisch gut zur exklusiven B2B-Marke von Classic Vacation und ihrem erstklassigen, hochwertigen Beraternetzwerk, das durch fast fünf Jahrzehnte Erfolg und Markenbekanntheit gestärkt wurde. „Wir freuen uns sehr, Classic Vacations in die TBO-Familie aufzunehmen. Das Unternehmen hat sich durch seine langjährige Bereitstellung herausragender Dienstleistungen das Vertrauen von mehr als 10.000 Reiseberatern in den USA und deren Endkunden erworben und passt damit perfekt zu unserer Vision für die Zukunft in der sich schnell entwickelnden Reise- und Tourismusbranche", sagte Gaurav Bhatnagar , Mitbegründer und stellvertretender Geschäftsführer von TBO. „Classic Vacations wird von einem starken Expertenteam geleitet und wird als unabhängige Marke weitergeführt, wobei die Technologie und die Vertriebskapazitäten von TBO genutzt werden, um das Geschäft auszubauen." „Diese Übernahme ist ein weiterer Schritt in unserer Strategie, sowohl in organische als auch in anorganische Wachstumschancen zu investieren. Während wir mit der Integration von Classic Vacations in TBO beginnen, bleiben wir auch in Zukunft offen für ähnliche strategische Allianzen", sagte Ankush Nijhawan , Mitbegründer und stellvertretender Geschäftsführer von TBO. „Wir freuen uns auf diese nächste Phase in der Entwicklung unseres Unternehmens – die technologieorientierten Lösungen von TBO sind vollständig auf unsere Reiseberater-Community ausgerichtet", sagte Melissa Krueger , CEO von Classic Vacations. „TBO verbindet uns mit seiner erstklassigen Technologieplattform, wie sie der Großhandelsmarkt bisher noch nicht kannte – so können wir unseren geschätzten Reiseberatern noch mehr Ressourcen, Tools und Insider-Kontakte bieten." „Gemeinsam stärken wir die Position von Classic Vacations als führender Luxuspartner auf dem Markt und erweitern gleichzeitig unsere Reichweite auf die globale Bühne, was die weltweite Präsenz unserer wichtigsten Kunden und Lieferantenpartner widerspiegelt", fügte Krueger hinzu. Die nächste Phase der Geschäftstätigkeit von TBO und Classic Vacations wird die kombinierte Stärke beider Unternehmen nutzen, um das Wachstum als weltweit führender Anbieter im Luxusreisemarkt zu beschleunigen und gleichzeitig die Kontinuität für Kunden, Lieferanten und Mitarbeiter sicherzustellen. Angesichts der Prognose, dass die weltweite Nachfrage nach Luxusreisen in den kommenden zehn Jahren erheblich steigen wird, schafft diese Partnerschaft eine stärkere Plattform, um den sich wandelnden Erwartungen der Reisenden gerecht zu werden und nachhaltigen Wert zu schaffen. Classic Vacations wurde 2021 von The Najafi Companies von der Expedia Group gekauft. „Diese Übernahme und Partnerschaft ist ein logischer nächster Schritt für unser Portfoliounternehmen Classic Vacations, und wir freuen uns, dass wir in den letzten vier Jahren erfolgreich mit ihnen zusammengearbeitet haben, um die Stärken und das Know-how des Unternehmens im Bereich Luxusreisen optimal zu nutzen. Mit einer nachgewiesenen Erfolgsbilanz bei der Schaffung von Mehrwert für Partner und Reisende ist Classic einzigartig positioniert, um die Branche voranzubringen und auf seiner langjährigen Leistungsbilanz für die kommenden Jahre aufzubauen", sagte Jahm Najafi , Gründer und CEO von The Najafi Companies. Moelis & Company LLC fungierte bei dieser Transaktion als exklusiver Finanzberater und Ballard Spahr LLP als Rechtsberater von Classic Vacations. Cooley LLP fungierte als Rechtsberater und PWC war der Finanz- und Steuerberater von TBO. Informationen zu TBO TBO wurde 2006 gegründet und ist eine der weltweit führenden Reisevertriebsplattformen, die darauf abzielt, den Kauf und Verkauf von Reiseleistungen für Reisepartner auf der ganzen Welt zu vereinfachen. Das Unternehmen nutzt Technologie, um die Anforderungen der komplexen Welt des globalen Reisens zu vereinfachen, indem es über 159.000 Reiseeinkäufer und 1 Million Reiseanbieter in mehr als 100 Ländern miteinander verbindet. Informationen zu Classic Vacations Classic Vacations ist ein führendes B2B2C-Luxusreiseunternehmen mit einem starken Netzwerk aus hochkarätigen Reiseberatern und engen Verbindungen zu großen amerikanischen Konsortien. Das professionell geführte Unternehmen nutzt kompetente Callcenter, um einen erstklassigen Service in den Bereichen Hotels, Flüge, Erlebnisse, Mietwagen und Reiseschutz zu bieten, wobei es sich auf komplexe, maßgeschneiderte Luxusreisen spezialisiert hat. Informationen zu The Najafi Companies The Najafi Companies mit Sitz in Phoenix und Niederlassungen in New York und Paris ist eine unternehmerisch orientierte private Investmentgesellschaft, die 2002 gegründet wurde. Das Unternehmen tätigt branchenübergreifende Investitionen und hält bedeutende Beteiligungen an Konsumgütermarken, E-Commerce, Medien, Reisen und Sport. Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter www.najafi.com . Medienkontakt: LAVIDGE PR najafi@lavidge.com Logo - https://mma.prnewswire.com/media/2762934/TBO_Logo.jpg Logo - https://mma.prnewswire.com/media/2762935/Classic_Vacations_Logo.jpg Logo - https://mma.prnewswire.com/media/1704133/Najafi_Companies_Logo.jpg

title: TBO ACQUIERT CLASSIC VACATIONS AUPRÈS DE THE NAJAFI COMPANIES AFIN D'ÉTENDRE SA PORTÉE MONDIALE ET DE CONQUÉRIR L'AMÉRIQUE DU NORD
content: L'acquisition par TBO du plus grand grossiste américain des voyages de luxe permet à l'entreprise d'étendre ses services de voyages haut de gamme à l'étranger à l'échelle mondiale SAN FRANCISCO , 3 septembre 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- TBO (NSE : TBO TEK), basée à Gurugram, en Inde, a annoncé avoir convenu d'acquérir l'entreprise Classic Vacations, basée aux États-Unis, auprès de la société d'investissement The Najafi Companies, basée à Phoenix , pour un montant total estimé à 125 millions USD. Cette acquisition va permettre d'associer la puissance de la plateforme technologique de premier ordre et de l'inventaire mondial de TBO au vaste réseau de conseillers et de fournisseurs de voyages de luxe de Classic Vacations. Classic Vacations a réalisé un chiffre d'affaires de 111 millions USD et un BAIIA opérationnel de 11,2 millions USD au cours de l'exercice clos le 31 décembre 2024. L'expansion de TBO sur le marché des voyages haut de gamme s'inscrit dans la continuité de la marque B2B exclusive de Classic Vacations et de son réseau de conseillers d'élite, reconnu et apprécié depuis près de cinq décennies. « Nous sommes ravis d'accueillir Classic Vacations au sein de la famille de TBO. Les services exceptionnels fournis de longue date par la société lui ont permis de gagner la confiance de ses plus de 10 000 conseillers en voyages aux États-Unis et de leurs clients finaux. Classic Vacations est donc un partenaire idéal pour répondre à notre vision de l'avenir face à l'évolution rapide de l'industrie du voyage et du tourisme. », a déclaré Gaurav Bhatnagar , cofondateur et directeur général adjoint de TBO. « Classic Vacations est dirigée par une équipe chevronnée d'experts et restera une marque indépendante, mais elle tirera parti de la technologie et des capacités de distribution de TBO pour développer ses activités. » « Cette acquisition vise à accélérer notre stratégie d'investissement dans des opportunités de croissance tant organique qu'inorganique. Alors que nous commençons à travailler à l'intégration de Classic Vacations à TBO, nous resterons ouverts à des alliances stratégiques similaires à l'avenir », a déclaré Ankush Nijhawan , cofondateur et directeur général adjoint de TBO. « Nous nous réjouissons de cette nouvelle étape dans le parcours de notre entreprise. Les solutions technologiques de TBO sont parfaitement adaptées à notre communauté de conseillers en voyages », a déclaré Melissa Krueger , PDG de Classic Vacations. « TBO nous offre un accès à sa plateforme technologique de premier ordre, à laquelle le marché de gros n'a jamais eu accès. Nous allons pouvoir ainsi fournir encore plus de ressources, d'outils et de contacts privilégiés à nos conseillers en voyages. » « Ensemble, nous renforçons la position de Classic Vacations en tant que partenaire de premier plan sur le marché du luxe, tout en étendant notre portée à l'échelle mondiale, reflétant ainsi l'empreinte planétaire de nos clients et de nos fournisseurs partenaires les plus importants », a ajouté Mme Krueger. Cette nouvelle phase des activités de TBO et de Classic Vacations tirera parti de la force combinée des deux entreprises, accélérant ainsi leur croissance en tant que leaders mondiaux du marché des voyages de luxe, tout en assurant la continuité pour les clients, les fournisseurs et les employés. La demande mondiale pour les voyages de luxe devant augmenter considérablement au cours de la prochaine décennie, ce partenariat crée une plateforme plus solide pour répondre aux attentes changeantes des voyageurs et générer une valeur durable. Classic Vacations a été racheté par The Najafi Companies en 2021 à Expedia Group. « Cette acquisition et ce partenariat marquent une étape naturelle pour notre société de portefeuille Classic Vacations, et nous sommes ravis d'avoir pu travailler avec succès avec eux au cours des quatre dernières années, en tirant parti de leurs forces et de leur expertise dans le domaine des voyages de luxe. Avec son expérience éprouvée en matière de création de valeur ajoutée pour les partenaires et les voyageurs, Classic est particulièrement bien placée pour faire progresser le secteur au cours des années à venir en s'appuyant sur son héritage de performance », a déclaré Jahm Najafi , fondateur et PDG de The Najafi Companies. Moelis & Company LLC a agi en tant que conseiller financier exclusif et Ballard Spahr LLP en tant que conseiller juridique de Classic Vacations dans le cadre de cette transaction. Cooley LLP a été le conseiller juridique et PWC le conseiller financier et fiscal de TBO. À propos de TBO Fondée en 2006, TBO est l'une des principales plateformes mondiales de distribution de voyages qui vise à simplifier l'achat et la vente de voyages pour les partenaires de voyage du monde entier. L'entreprise s'appuie sur la technologie pour simplifier les exigences du monde complexe des voyages internationaux, en mettant en relation plus de 159 000 acheteurs de voyages et 1 million de fournisseurs de voyages dans plus de 100 pays. À propos de Classic Vacations Classic Vacations est une société de voyages de luxe B2B2C de premier plan qui dispose d'un solide réseau de conseillers en voyages de grande valeur et entretient des liens étroits avec les principaux consortiums américains. Gérée de manière professionnelle, l'entreprise s'appuie sur des centres d'appels spécialisés pour offrir un service de première qualité dans les domaines de l'hôtellerie, de l'aviation, des expériences, de la location de voitures et de la protection voyage, en se spécialisant dans les itinéraires de luxe complexes et sur mesure. À propos de The Najafi Companies Basée à Phoenix , avec des bureaux à New York et à Paris , The Najafi Companies est une société d'investissement privé fondée en 2002 et animée par l'esprit d'entreprise. L'entreprise réalise des investissements dans tous les secteurs, avec des participations importantes dans les marques de grande consommation, le commerce électronique, les médias, les voyages et les sports. Pour plus d'informations, rendez-vous sur www.najafi.com . Contact avec les médias : LAVIDGE PR najafi@lavidge.com Logo - https://mma.prnewswire.com/media/2762934/TBO_Logo.jpg Logo - https://mma.prnewswire.com/media/2762935/Classic_Vacations_Logo.jpg Logo - https://mma.prnewswire.com/media/1704133/Najafi_Companies_Logo.jpg

title: Cresta Closes a New Investment Vehicle to Support the Growth of Sentinel Midstream's Enercoast Platform
content: DALLAS , Sept. 3, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Cresta Fund Management LLC ( Cresta ), a Dallas -based private equity firm that invests in energy infrastructure, today announced the completion of a new investment vehicle for Sentinel Midstream ( Sentinel ), a liquids pipeline platform across the Gulf Coast. The new vehicle, managed by Cresta and backed by investor Endurance Investment Partners ( Endurance ), will provide liquidity to existing investors while enabling Cresta to remain a long-term partner in Sentinel's growth strategy. Through its Enercoast Midstream subsidiary (Enercoast), Sentinel owns and operates critical last-mile infrastructure that connects major Gulf Coast terminals to world-class refineries and export facilities. Since Cresta's initial investment in Enercoast in 2021, Enercoast has acquired controlling interests in two joint ventures in Texas and Louisiana and has built a reputation for safe, efficient operations and strategic growth. "Enercoast's success is a testament to the strength of its assets, the quality of its partnerships, and the capabilities of the Sentinel management team," said Wade Webber , Managing Director at Cresta. "This transaction underscores Cresta's dedication to investing in Gulf Coast infrastructure that sits at the heart of America's energy future." "We are grateful to our investors for their trust and support, and we are proud to partner with Cresta, a leading energy infrastructure sponsor. We also want to recognize the Sentinel management team for building an outstanding platform. We are excited to be part of the next phase of growth and to support the continued success of the business," said John Spradling , Partner at Endurance. "I'm excited to continue our partnership with Cresta and deeply value our shared vision for Sentinel's next chapter of growth. Sentinel is well positioned to accelerate its strategic development and capitalize on midstream opportunities along the Gulf Coast," said Jeff Ballard , CEO of Sentinel. For Cresta, the transaction reflects the firm's experience in acquiring, developing, and operating essential energy infrastructure. With a history of investments across the energy value chain, Cresta views Sentinel's next stage as an opportunity to leverage that expertise in advancing resilient and strategically positioned midstream assets. Kirkland & Ellis LLP and Vinson & Elkins LLP served as legal counsel on the transaction. About Cresta Fund Management Cresta Fund Management (Cresta) is a Dallas -based private equity firm providing growth equity for sustainable and conventional energy infrastructure solutions for the industrial, logistics and agricultural sectors. With approximately $1.6 billion of assets under management, Cresta is led by an operations-focused team with decades of experience in the energy and infrastructure industries. For more information, please visit crestafunds.com . About Endurance Investment Partners Endurance Investment Partners (EIP) is a private equity firm based in Dallas, Texas . The firm seeks to provide strategic liquidity solutions to leading energy and infrastructure sponsors and management teams to extend duration and maximize the value of private assets. For more information, please visit www.enduranceip.com . About Sentinel Midstream Sentinel, headquartered in Dallas, Texas , owns and operates crude oil pipelines along the Texas and Louisiana Gulf Coast providing direct refining and export dock access. Contact Jessica Groshek Cresta Fund Management External.Affairs@crestafunds.com (945) 468-6564 SOURCE Cresta Fund Management LLC

title: Modera Wealth Management Expands Tax Practice Through Transaction with Ferrentino & Associates
content: New Jersey -based accounting practice joins the $15 billion wealth management firm to provide enhanced tax services for clients WESTWOOD, N.J. , Sept. 3, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Modera Wealth Management , a fee-only wealth management firm for individuals, families, business owners, and non-profit institutions, today announced its transaction with Ferrentino & Associates ("Ferrentino"), a New Jersey -based accounting firm specializing in tax planning, preparation, and consulting services for high-net-worth individuals, small business owners, estates, and trusts. The transaction enables Modera to expand the depth and delivery of its in-house tax capabilities. Ferrentino has built a reputation for a client-first approach, financial acumen, and technical experience. Gary Ferrentino , the firm's founder and CEO, has over 30 years of experience in tax planning and consulting. In his new role as Director of Tax Services, Gary will lead Modera's tax practice, guide the firm's tax strategy, and work closely with advisors to deliver integrated tax services. His team will join the firm's existing tax group, based in Asheville, NC , creating a team of tax professionals that work with clients across the country. "I feel strongly that a client is best served when their investment advisor and accountant are in close communication. I always felt that it was a natural fit. This is why we have so many mutual clients; we see the benefits of working together," said Gary. Being part of Modera also provides an environment in which his team can grow. "By joining Modera, we are able to provide additional opportunities for our team and attract talented professionals in new markets. My vision is to look beyond the tax practice to offer estate administration and other services that will benefit our clients." "Gary and I have worked together for more than 25 years. This is a formalization of a relationship built on shared purpose," said Tom Orecchio , CEO of Modera. "Unified planning across investments, taxes, and estate strategy isn't just a value-add; it's essential to full-service, fiduciary wealth management. Gary's firm has provided tax planning, preparation, and consulting services to Modera and our clients. As a result of this transaction, our clients will have access to sophisticated tax guidance and accounting advisory services as part of our holistic, integrated service model." About Modera Wealth Management Modera Wealth Management provides sophisticated wealth advisory, financial planning, investment management, and tax services to individuals, families, nonprofit institutions, and retirement plan sponsors. The firm serves more than 6,000 clients across the country and oversees $15 billion in assets under management as of December 31, 2024 . With a strong client-first culture since its inception in 1983, Modera is majority owned by employee shareholders and committed to making a positive and lasting impact on its clients, employees, and communities. Visit ModeraWealth.com to learn more. Modera Wealth Management, LLC (Modera) is an SEC-registered investment adviser. SEC registration does not imply any level of skill or training. For information pertaining to our registration status, the fees we charge including how we are compensated and by whom, additional costs that may be incurred, our conflicts of interest, any disclosed disciplinary events of the Firm or its personnel, and the types of services we offer, please contact us directly or refer to the Investment Adviser Public Disclosure website ( www.adviserinfo.sec.gov ) to obtain a copy of our disclosure statement, Form ADV Part 2A, and ADV Part 3/Form CRS. In addition, our Privacy Notice outlines how we handle your non-public personal information. Please read these documents carefully before you make a decision to hire Modera, invest or send money.
